title: #92Noon! Fran Tarkenton & Bud Grant steal the show
description: Plenty of football talkers throughout the Monday show, but the 10am hour is a treat as Fran Tarkenton makes his bi-weekly appearance, with a surprise Bud Grant addition that simply stole the entire show.
itunes:summary: Plenty of football talkers throughout the Monday show, but the 10am hour is a treat as Fran Tarkenton makes his bi-weekly appearance, with a surprise Bud Grant addition that simply stole the entire show.
